official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the preservation of the historic Rhodes Tavern, Keith's Theatre and Albee Building, and National Metropolitan Bank Building in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that every effort be made to preserve Rhodes Tavern, Keith's Theatre and Albee Building, and the National Metropolitan Bank Building in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the preservation of the historic Rhodes Tavern, Keith's Theatre and Albee Building, and National Metropolitan Bank Building in the District of Columbia.
